                                     jslibs
                                     version 0.95 r????


LICENSE:
  This software is under the GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE Version 2
  Refer to the file gpl-2.0.txt for license agreement.


CONTENT:
  This package contains the latest binaries files of jslibs, jslibs quality assurance tests and some examples of use.


IMPORTANT:
  jslibs binaries are compiled with the dynamic version of the C++ runtime,
  this mean you need the "Visual C++ 2005 SP1 Redistributable Package (x86)" to be installed on your system.
  To test if the package is already installed, just run jshost.exe. If you get an error message, the package is not installed.
  If the package is not installed on your system, you can download it here (2.5MB):
    http://www.microsoft.com/downloads/details.aspx?familyid=200B2FD9-AE1A-4A14-984D-389C36F85647&displaylang=en
  or here:
    http://downloads.sourceforge.net/wxjs/vcredist_x86-sp1.exe?use_mirror=osdn


QUICK TEST:
  launch console.cmd and type:
    jshost examples\helloworld.js
    jshost examples\miniInteractiveConsole.js
    jshost examples\systray.js


DOCUMENTATION:
  The on-line jslibs API documentation is available here:
    http://code.google.com/p/jslibs/wiki/JSLibs


SOURCE CODE:
  The source code of jslibs is here:
    http://code.google.com/p/jslibs/source/checkout


BUGS:
  You can report bugs or issues here:
    http://code.google.com/p/jslibs/issues/list


CONTACT:
  soubok+jslibs@gmail.com


CHANGES:

  ???
